author: Staff Reporter
text:
Women SHGs have demanded that a higher amount of loan of Rs.50 lakh per group be granted to them for scaling up their businesses/industrial ventures.

In a memorandum submitted to the Union Minister for Labour and Employment, Bandaru Dattatreya, at Sriperumpudur on Monday, the SHG members pointed out that at present a maximum of Rs.10 lakh was insufficient and they were forced to make additional investments to sustain their projects, they claimed. Hence, they urged to raise the ceiling of the loan.
title: Women SHGs seek bulk loan
